compatibility.notes: OpenPBS-2.3 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses, particularly those in the GPL family.

key_requirements: Proper attribution must be given if the software contributes to a publication, product, or service.
No charge for the software or any software incorporating it.
Redistributions must be accompanied by source code or information on how to obtain it.
license.name: OpenPBS-2.3
obligations: Maintain a current software registration at www.OpenPBS.org for commercial use.
Redistribution is only permitted for non-commercial, non-profit purposes.
Retain copyright notice and acknowledgment in redistributions.
Include license and disclaimer in binary redistributions.
Provide information on how to obtain complete source code for the software.
